entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending after midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of freezing drizzle or drizzle. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to zero by morning.
